head.title: COVID-19 Resources for Families – Parents & Students – Basehor-Linwood School District

meta.name: description
meta.content: Basehor-Linwood School District serves K-12th grade students and is located in Basehor, KS.

div.div: Grab and Go Lunch/Breakfasts from USD 458 for any child ages 1-18. Pick up between 11:30 - 12:30 each day at Linwood Elementary, Basehor-Linwood Middle School or Basehor-Linwood High School. All we require is your child's name for pick up.

Runnels Chiropractic North is providing sack lunches free of charge, no questions asked to those in need at 15510 State Ave, Suite 10B in Basehor between 9 a.m. - 1 p.m. and 3 p.m. - 6 p.m. Mondays - Thursdays and 9 a.m. - 1 p.m. on Fridays!

div.span: Midco has also offered Midco Internet Basics, for low-income households with K-12 and/or college students who don't have Internet access (see letter from Midco below).
